A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: An insult to the saga and viewers on every level. This is the last Star Wars movie I will be paying to see. Rian Johnson and company should be ashamed of themselves for this garbage. This movie should immediately be wiped from canon. Beyond being a terrible Star Wars movie\, on a basic story telling level it is completely flawed at every turn. Don't waste your money or your time (2.5 hours). The 90+ critic rating tells me that these critics have ulterior motives for giving such a score. Trust the viewers on this one gang.
